attributes.action: Introduce a minimum wage for under 16s, and raise the minimum age for over 16s.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm 15, and work at a hotel. As there is no minimum wage, I feel I am paid very little, but have found this in all jobs. As all the staff take cigarette breaks, they leave me to serve breakfasts and look after all guests, yet complain when I have 5 minutes to eat my breakfast.
Yet, I am on £3.30 an hour, and they are on £5.52 minimum.
I feel I work harder than they do, yet they get a lot more pay, and I find this unfair.
I would like to see a minimum wage for under 16s to be increased, and the minimum wage for under 21s to be raised fairly near to, if not equal to that of the over 21s.
